title: Death from amphetamine drug use in England and Wales 1993 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of deaths has decreased over the Year.
Number of deaths is slightly decreasing from 1999 to 2000, roughly increasing from 2000 to 2003, and lastly roughly constant from 2003 to 2007.
The line drastically increased by 1.8 times from Year 2001 to 2002.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1999 and 2000.
Maximum Number of deaths, about 67.0 was reported at Year 1999
The lowest Number of deaths, of value 28.0 was reported at Year 2001
